node.display_long_description:
Must-have bow & arrow action game with state of the art Quest graphics. 

NEW GAME MODE “SIEGE OF HEAVEN” AND QUEST 2 UPGRADES!!!

Battle through the floating castles of medieval fantasy to restore Harmony in Heaven, Purgatory & Hell. Rain down arrows against forsaken souls and angelic creatures that have taken over the afterlife.

Finally a great Roguelite on Quest, excellent great replay value that adapts to the player’s skill level and progress as they play. Three beautiful and mysterious, procedurally generated worlds, with infinite replayability, three epic boss fights, multiple optional areas with great loot.

NEW! Free DLC with gate-defense game mode “Siege of Heaven” with 3 extra maps, 50+ new achievements, and leaderboards - perfect for new players and casual VR enthusiasts and advanced players alike, enjoy VR’s highest-rated bow & arrow mechanics shooting a safe spot in a beautiful environment.

Uses VR to the max and makes the most of Quest & Quest 2.

nodes.title: The 15 minutes of Fame Tournament is on!
nodes.body_text:
Hey everyone!

Season 3 is in full swing and now it’s time for some extra competition! We present to you In Death: Unchained - 15 Minutes of Fame Tournament.

Fight for the next generation full-body haptic suits from bHaptics and many other prizes!

What’s the tournament about?

It's about the highest score! Each day of the tournament will be dedicated to one map:
- 1st and 4th day: Purgatory
- 2nd and 5th day: Paradise Lost
- 3rd and 6th day: The Abyss

Try to get as many points as possible in one run. Each run lasts 15 minutes and you can try as many times as you want. Your personal highest score from each map will be saved and the sum of all 3 top scores will be displayed on a Total Leaderboard. There will be separate leaderboards for bow and crossbow players.

There are also four teams competing for the highest score. Each team is led by a fantastic Content Creator you can watch and follow on YouTube. You can decide which team to support before each run - simply stand on one of the colored beacons to support one of the teams or choose the gray beacon in the middle if you want to play without supporting any team. You can support multiple teams over the course of the tournament should you wish.

VR Content Creators, you can support by joining their team:
- Beardo Benjo http://youtube.com/BeardoBenjo
- Matteo311 http://youtube.com/Gamingwithmatteo311
- Soul Fox Gaming http://youtube.com/SoulFoxGaming
- SteveKnows http://youtube.com/SteveKnows

How to enter the tournament?

Go through the new portal in Sanctuary. Choose if you want to support one of the teams or not. Playing every single day of the Tournament gives you (and your team if you choose one) the best chance of winning!

What are the rewards?

Every participant gets:
- set of special weapon skins, which will stay in the game forever
- legend points

Bow and crossbow podium winners get:
- 1st place winners will receive Oculus Quest 2 Elite Strap with battery and case or equivalent
- 2nd place will receive Oculus Quest 2 Elite Strap or equivalent
- 3rd place winners will receive: Oculus Quest 2 Elite Strap or equivalent

The teams will compete against each other for the highest score (sum of total scores of the players who supported the team). The rewards will be distributed by Content Creators depending on their place in the competition. To sign up for the reward raffle, follow the instructions available on your team's Content Creator YouTube channel!
Depending on the place taken by his team, the Content Creator receives a prize pool to be raffled among the players who signed up for the raffle:

- 1st place: bHaptics TactSuit X40 + 5 codes for any game in Oculus Store
- 2nd place: bHaptics TactSuit X40 + 4 codes for any game in the Oculus Store
- 3rd place: bHaptics TactSuit X16 + 3 codes for any game in the Oculus Store
- 4th place: bHaptics TactSuit X16 + 2 codes for any game in the Oculus Store

Everyone who supported a Content Creator can sign up to an award raffle.

What else is important?

- You play with your own achievement progress
- Entrance to the Pits does not appear in the Tournament mode
- If you're fast enough to defeat Anakim, Gabriel, or Asmodeus before the time is up, you'll start the same map over on a higher cycle
- After 15 minutes are up you’ll get teleported back to Sanctuary
- You can check the remaining time by looking at your hand (palm up)
- If you die during the run your score still saves to the Leaderboard
- Leaderboards will be updated every 15 minutes

The tournament will be on until 8 AM PDT/5 PM CEST May 20th.

We can’t wait to have our minds blown by the scores you can achieve in just 15 minutes. So grab your bows and crossbows and show us what you can do!

Good luck!
Superbright

nodes.title: We’re ending Season 2 early, Season 3 will start on April 21st.
nodes.body_text:
Our fantastic community helped us spot some issues in high-level play scoring that we felt needed addressing. We wouldn’t want these issues to affect how the game’s played, so we’re ending Season 2 much sooner than originally planned. Season 3 will start soon with proper adjustments.

On April 21st:
- All players will earn experience and ranks for their placement on the leaderboard
- Season 3 will begin with NEW LEADERBOARDS
- Player progress % will be retained between seasons
- Ranks from previous seasons will be rewarded with weapon skins
- High level scoring system will be fixed and rebalanced
  
The time is coming for your final runs and high scores. Now is a good moment to ensure your experience, rewards, and fame!

Stay tuned!

node.reviewDescription:
I own a high end gaming PC and own every major VR release on both Steam and Occulus, and THIS game is holding my attention longer than anything else.

Don’t get me wrong, Half Life: Alex, Boneworks, Pavlov etc are all incredible experiences, but the fact that this humble little archery game is competing with the big dogs speaks for itself.

I have more hours on this game than I do any other VR game that I own. I also own 4 different archery games and this one is by far my favorite.
